video:video.video:title: Vision Furniture Resin Folding Chair
video:video.video:description: Our VF chair passes all BIFMA (Business and Institutional Furniture Manufacturers Association) testing. VF chairs are built for reliability, safety and value. We have achieved this through updated technology, careful design and deliberate product development. The proof is in the look and feel of our chair, as well as the chair's performance in strenuous product testing. And this video highlights all the testing we put our chairs through
